headlines.shortHeadline: Kuki minisiteri y'umutekano igarutse mu Rwanda?
headlines.headline: Kuki minisiteri y'umutekano igarutse? Kuki Biruta agiye mu bubanyi n'amahanga?

promo.summary: Ibikomeye mu mpinduka zabaye ni aho General Patrick Nyamvumba yagizwe minisitiri w'umutekano mu gihugu, naho Vincent Biruta akagirwa uw'ububanyi n'amahanga.

indexImage.altText: Patrick Nyamvumba
indexImage.caption: Bwana Khalfan avuga ko minisiteri ijyaho kugira ngo ibashe gukurikiranira hafi. Ku ifoto ni jenerali Nyamvumba wagizwe minisitiri w'umutekano

headlines.shortHeadline: Umubano w'u Burundi n'Uburusiya ushingiye kuki?
headlines.headline: Uburusiya burizeza u Burundi gukomeza kubushyigikira mu mahanga

promo.summary: Ibiro ntaramakuru Tass bya leta y'Uburusiya bisubiramo amagambo ya Bwana Lavrov agira ati: "Twaganiriye cyane ku bibazo biganirwaho muri UN n'indi miryango mpuzamahanga".

indexImage.altText: Minisitiri Nibigira na mugenzi we Lavrov mu biganiro ejo i Moscow
indexImage.caption: Minisitiri Nibigira na mugenzi we Lavrov mu biganiro ejo i Moscow

headlines.shortHeadline: Batorotse gereza y'i California baciye mu mwobo wa 55cm
headlines.headline: Abacyekwaho ubwicanyi batorotse gereza y'i California banyuze mu mwobo wa 55cm

promo.summary: Santos Samuel Fonseca w'imyaka 21 na Jonathan Salazar w'imyaka 20, barakambakambye banyura mu mwobo ufite ubugari bwa santimetero 55 bacukuye mu gisenge cy'ubwiherero bwa gereza.

indexImage.altText: Santos Samuel Fonseca (ibumoso) na Jonathan Salazar (iburyo) batorotse gereza yo mu karere ka Monterey

indexImage.altText: Faustin Rukundo, Umunyarwanda utuye i Leeds mu Bwongereza uri mu batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda, avuga ko yakozweho ubutasi kuri WhatsApp

headlines.shortHeadline: 'Isi iri mu kaga gakomeye' - Mikhail Gorbachev
headlines.headline: Mikhail Gorbachev wayoboye URSS avuga ko ubu 'isi iri mu kaga gakomeye'

promo.summary: We na Perezida Ronald Reagan basinye amasezerano yo kugabanya ibitwaro kirimbuzi babitse mu nzu z'intwaro zabo none ubu ibihugu byombi byayavuyemo.

indexImage.altText: Mikhail Gorbachev uahawe igihembo cy'amahoro cya Nobel mu 1990 kubara guharanira amahoro

headlines.shortHeadline: Ubutasi kuri telephone yawe utabizi
headlines.headline: Kuki WhatsApp iri kurega? Ubwo butasi bwakozwe no ku Banyarwanda

promo.summary: Umuntu kanaka urwego rw'ubutasi rushakaho amakuru avuye kuri telephone ye, ikigo gikoresha 'Pegasus' gikora ibishoboka ku buryo iyi 'software' igera muri telephone ye.

indexImage.altText: Pegasus
indexImage.caption: Iyo witabye, cyangwa ukanze kuri iyo 'link' ntacyo ubona kidasanzwe, ahubwo uba ukinguriye 'pegasus' ikiyinjiza (install) muri telephone yawe utabizi

headlines.headline: Denise Nkurunziza yasohoye indirimbo yamagana ihohoterwa ry'abagore

promo.summary: Mu bihe byashize, Madamu Denise yagiye agaragara mu ndirimbo zaririmbiwe Imana, ariko bisa nkaho ari ubwa mbere agaragaye mu mashusho y'indirimbo itari iyo muri uwo mujyo w'indirimbo z'Imana.

indexImage.altText: Madamu Denise Nkurunziza aririmba muri iyo ndirimbo ye

headlines.shortHeadline: Niba Kagame ahuye na Nkurunziza biratanga iki?

promo.summary: Ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi n'u Rwanda burebana nabi kuva mu 2015 ubwo habaga igerageza rya 'coup d'état' mu Burundi.

headlines.shortHeadline: Muri RNC 'bazi aho Rutabana ari' - Diane Rutabana

promo.summary: Diane Rutabana yabwiye BBC ko abayobozi n'abayoboke ba RNC bagiye bamuha amakuru atandukanye, amwe avuguruzanya, ku ibura ry'umugabo we.

indexImage.altText: Ben Rutabana
indexImage.caption: Umuhanzi Ben Rutabana yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo ze nka "Imbaraga z'urukundo" nyuma yinjira muri politiki mu ishyaka RNC

headlines.shortHeadline: Demokarasi iwacu ihagaze ite?
headlines.headline: Bafata ubutegetsi bavuga ko bazanye demokarasi, bageze he bayizana?
